alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 1:56PM AKST until February 25 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW LASTING THROUGH SATURDAY... .Low pressure over the NE Gulf will remain in place through Friday night while an associated front with embedded waves will move over the panhandle. A stronger wave along the front will cause rates to pick up in the late afternoon and evening hours Friday. Some uncertainty remains regarding snow totals due to limited moisture in the central and northern inner channels. For most areas the greatest snowfall rates continue to be Friday evening through early Saturday morning while Yakutat may see snow ending earlier. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to reduced visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light, dry snow has been falling through the day on Friday before a wave arrives in the afternoon, resulting in an increase in snowfall rates. Greatest snowfall rates are expected late Friday afternoon through Friday night. Lower snowfall totals may be possible in Skagway.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
